name: Herp Derp's Plight
description:
Herp Derp's Plight is a 2D, Roguelike card battling game inspired by games such as Dungeons And Dragons, Slay The Spire and Divinity 2: Original Sin. The player controls a team a characters, and must successfully navigate a procedurally generated dungeon, overrun with undead, goblins, and all manner of deplorable foes. 

Source code + assets are available here: https://github.com/WillBlackney/Herp-Derps-Plight-Source-Code-And-Project-Files 

Features

- Create a custom character to start the game with: choose your starting cards, talents, weapons, race, appearance and more!

- Craft a unique deck as fight your way through the castle, adding, removing and upgrading cards as you go.

- Recruit up to 4 additional procedurally generated allies to adventure with, each with their own card deck and attributes.

- Power up your party by slaying elite foes and collecting States: powerful party wide buffs that impact your entire run. 

- Choose your own path through the dungeon with procedurally generated maps that differ from run to run. Decide when to fight, when to heal, when to shop, and when to run away!
